channel.title: 100% Sounds on a 317
channel.description:
[CENTER]Alright well my current "Side" Project for my server is to add 100% Sounds for everything from scratch.
[size=24pt]What to expect[/size] 100% Prayer Turning on And Off Sounds All 317 Weapon Sounds All 317 Special Attack Sounds Blocking/Defence Sounds Teleporting/Magic Sounds Pickup and Droping Sounds Object Sounds You get the point pretty much sounds for everything used in a rsps
[size=24pt]What is Completed[/size] All 317 Weapon Sounds Teleporting/Magic Sounds Object Sounds Pickup and Droping Sounds
[size=24pt]Why Im doing this[/size] Well I haven't seen one rsps with all of the sounds, I have only seen a few and they only had the basics like teleporting
[size=24pt]Will this be released?[/size] Most likely
[size=24pt]Videos[/size] None atm as they are being created
[size=24pt]Update Log[/size] 01/08/2010-Started and added Basics like Teleporting 03/08/2010-Added Melle Combat Sound Handler Tested and Working 90% (Missing some sound id's) 03/08/2010-Added Picking up and Droping Sounds 04/08/2010-Added Sounds for prayer burying and using bones on a altar 04/08/2010-Added Food Eating and Potion Drinking Sounds 04/08/2010-Added a command to turn Sound Off and On, Tested and Working 100%
[size=24pt]Credits[/size] wolfs goal-frame174 Method and Sound list Primadude-Sound list Me-Creating the handlers and making this work[/CENTER]

item.title: 100% Sounds on a 317
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Noobie22:

Take them from jagex cache? I think they’re loaded from there…

That’s what he’s doing; he just sends a packet to the client and it plays the sound requested :P.

Read full topic

item.title: 100% Sounds on a 317
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:6, topic:352969"][quote author=Primadude link=topic=449284.msg3296762#msg3296762 date=1280999550]

you have your work cut out for you, considering theres a couple thousand attackable npcs, 3 or 4 sounds per npc is quite a few

Good luck, though.

There’s only around 2750 sounds in the 377 client.

@icestorm: if you need any sounds ids, PM me and I’ll see if I have them; I’m aiming to add full sounds and music to my server, also.
[/quote]Alright, I gave you credits for the sound list you posted on wolf’s topic :p[/quote]

I was the one that actually gave wolfs goal the method to send the sound packet to the client :P.

Read full topic

item.title: 100% Sounds on a 317
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:2, topic:352969”]creativescape had nearly full sounds for most skills, areas and everything.[/quote]Ik but im coding this for delta and PI

[quote=“badger41, post:3, topic:352969”]you have your work cut out for you, considering theres a couple thousand attackable npcs, 3 or 4 sounds per npc is quite a few

Good luck, though.[/quote]Lol I know I guess my title does kinda lie :p, It won’t be every single sound in the game, The only sounds that will be coded in are for stuff in my server like Prayer Altar Noises and Combat Noises. Basicly if theres a sound for it and you can do it on my server the sound will play.

Read full topic

item.title: 100% Sounds on a 317
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[CENTER]Alright well my current “Side” Project for my server is to add 100% Sounds for everything from scratch.

[size=24pt]What to expect[/size]
100% Prayer Turning on And Off Sounds
All 317 Weapon Sounds
All 317 Special Attack Sounds
Blocking/Defence Sounds
Teleporting/Magic Sounds
Pickup and Droping Sounds
Object Sounds
You get the point pretty much sounds for everything used in a rsps

[size=24pt]What is Completed[/size]
All 317 Weapon Sounds
Teleporting/Magic Sounds
Object Sounds
Pickup and Droping Sounds

[size=24pt]Why Im doing this[/size]
Well I haven’t seen one rsps with all of the sounds, I have only seen a few and they only had the basics like teleporting

[size=24pt]Will this be released?[/size]
Most likely

[size=24pt]Videos[/size]
None atm as they are being created

[size=24pt]Update Log[/size]
01/08/2010-Started and added Basics like Teleporting
03/08/2010-Added Melle Combat Sound Handler Tested and Working 90% (Missing some sound id’s)
03/08/2010-Added Picking up and Droping Sounds
04/08/2010-Added Sounds for prayer burying and using bones on a altar
04/08/2010-Added Food Eating and Potion Drinking Sounds
04/08/2010-Added a command to turn Sound Off and On, Tested and Working 100%

[size=24pt]Credits[/size]
wolfs goal-frame174 Method and Sound list
Primadude-Sound list
Me-Creating the handlers and making this work[/CENTER]

Read full topic
